import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import { Note } from './note';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.css']
})
export class AppComponent {
  notes: Note[] = [
    {label: "HTTP Server",
     description: "Write a serving get/post requests HTTP server",
     id: "c1"},
    {label: "Client side",
     description: "Frontend Web Applictation",
     id: "c2"},
    {label: "FTP Server",
     description: "For personal purposes only",
     id: "c3"},
    {label: "",
     description: "",
     id: "c4"},
    {label: "HttpServer",
     description: "Write a serving get/post requests HTTP server",
     id: "c5"},
    {label: "Client side",
     description: "Frontend Web Applictation",
     id: "c6"},
  ]


}
